Title: Best low end full frame
Cons: Plastic feel, the shutter button feels cheap and not strong
Pros: Light weight, beautiful photos even at high ISO

Title: Great for the price
Cons: a bit plastic feel, but i guess i cant complain since its lightweight.
Pros: lightweight, FX, HD video recording features, Low light performance, 20 min video recording time and image quality
Comments: The image quality is great. I was surprised by the quality of the build(even thought there is that plastic feel)and the low light performance. No dust problems yet.
